item.title: Rose add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Be the change that you wish to see in the world." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Rose add a quote by Marcus Tullius Cicero
item.description: "A room without books is like a body without a soul." -- Marcus Tullius Cicero

item.title: Rose add a quote by Frank Zappa
item.description: "So many books, so little time." -- Frank Zappa

item.title: Rose add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Live as if you were to die tomorrow. Learn as if you were to live forever." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Rose add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "Whenever you find yourself on the side of the majority, it is time to pause and reflect." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Rose add a quote by Elie Wiesel
item.description: "The opposite of love is not hate, it's indifference. The opposite of art is not ugliness, it's indifference. The opposite of faith is not heresy, it's indifference. And the opposite of life is not death, it's indifference." -- Elie Wiesel

item.title: Rose add a quote by Narcotics Anonymous
item.description: "Insanity is doing the same thing, over and over again, but expecting different results." -- Narcotics Anonymous

item.title: Rose add a quote by Allen Saunders
item.description: "Life is what happens to you while you're busy making other plans." -- Allen Saunders

item.title: Rose add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "That which does not kill us makes us stronger." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Rose add a quote by Groucho Marx
item.description: "I find television very educating. Every time somebody turns on the set, I go into the other room and read a book." -- Groucho Marx

item.title: Rose add a quote by Gustave Flaubert
item.description: "Do not read, as children do, to amuse yourself, or like the ambitious, for the purpose of instruction. No, read in order to live." -- Gustave Flaubert

item.title: Rose add a quote by Lemony Snicket
item.description: "Never trust anyone who has not brought a book with them." -- Lemony Snicket

item.title: Rose add a quote by John Steinbeck
item.description: "Try to understand men. If you understand each other you will be kind to each other. Knowing a man well never leads to hate and almost always leads to love." -- John Steinbeck

item.title: Rose add a quote by R J Ellory
item.description: "Donâ€™t ever stop writing. This is the way the world will find out who you are." -- R J Ellory

item.title: Rose add a quote by R.J. Ellory
item.description: "Loneliness is a drug, a narcotic; it grows through veins, through nerves and muscles; it assumes some right of possession over your body and mind; it feeds itself, and creates its own requirement. Loneliness and solitude are walls." -- R.J. Ellory

item.title: Rose add a quote by R.J. Ellory
item.description: "Blame is a bitter and indigestible thing, even when the blame is a coat you cut for yourself, even when you stood right there and got yourself measured so you could wear it right." -- R.J. Ellory

item.title: Rose add a quote by David Levithan
item.description: "Maybe that's it, [...] [w]ith what you were talking about before. The world being broken. Maybe it isn't that we're supposed to find the pieces and put them back together. Maybe <i>we're</i> the pieces." [...] "Maybe [...] what we're supposed to do is come together. That's how we stop the breaking." -- David Levithan

item.title: Rose add a quote by Amy Hempel
item.description: "I want to know everything about you, so I tell you everything about myself." -- Amy Hempel

item.title: Rose add a quote by Paul Klee
item.description: "One eye sees, the other feels." -- Paul Klee

item.title: Rose add a quote by Neil Gaiman
item.description: "I hope that in this year to come, you make mistakes. Because if you are making mistakes...you're Doing Something." -- Neil Gaiman

item.title: Rose add a quote by John Cheever
item.description: "I've been homesick for countries I've never been, and longed to be where I couldn't be." -- John Cheever
